ygData.msgSnippet: Cyber Claw: The more bots that come in the War room, the more paniced Cyber Claw got, her spark pulsing faster. He gasped, as if she was suffocating, then

Cyber Claw:




The more bots that come in the War room, the more paniced Cyber Claw got, 
her spark pulsing faster. He gasped, as if she was suffocating, then bolted 
into the hallway. She ran off until she was a distance away from the 
commotion. She had forgotten about the presents of other bots. It made her 
edgy and go into a defensive mood. The only time she came into contact with 
other bots was when they were out to kill her. Both Predacon and Maximal 
were after her. The Predacons were the ones that tracked her, until no end. 
They had turned her into nothing but a mess of a bot. She had lost sleep, 
had to always be on the move, watch every shape and shadow in the forest, 
and fight the awful memories.

She grasped her chest and leaned against the corridor, holding herself up 
with one hand. She wanted so bad to go back to the forest, she was close the 
point of screaming. But her logic bot insticts told her to go with business 
and find out about Megatron and his Predacons she once belonged to. She felt 
like she would fall to the floor, with the weakness of herself. Not physical 
weakness, but mental weakness.

She ducked her head and let out a strangled scream between her clentched 
teeth.
